snippet: The health benefits of the Mediterranean diet, rich in olive oil, fish and fresh produce, are now widely accepted. But in the region itself, experts warn that Spain, among others, is losing its healthy traditions to a 21st century lifestyle and even...
abstract: The health benefits of the Mediterranean diet, rich in olive oil, fish and fresh produce, are now widely accepted. But in the region itself, experts warn that Spain, among others, is losing its healthy traditions to a 21st century lifestyle and even poverty.
